import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useState } from "react"; function Contact() { const [contactData, setcontactData] = useState('var(--mainBgcolor)'); const [DiplomaText, setDiplomaText] = useState('black'); const [visitText, setvisitText] = useState('black'); const DarkMode = () => { if (contactData === 'black') { setcontactData('var(--mainBgcolor)') setDiplomaText('#212329') setvisitText('#212329') } else { setcontactData('black') setDiplomaText('white') setvisitText('white') } } return (
